project.projectText:
A PSA for New York's Department of Health, highlighting the tragic result of years of smoking by Marie, a Bronx resident.

Norman J was hired to art direct the interview and incorporate graphic elements to help illustrate Marie's tragic story.


Director: Henry Corra
Art Direction & Design: Todd J Neale

Sesame Street ask us to make a short film about baking healthy cookies.


Shot in the best kitchen in Brooklyn on digital SLR.



Director: Todd J Neale & Leigh Davis


Photograpy: Leigh Davis.


Music: Jasper Berg.

Who hasn't lost a sock.
Well here's how they find one another when you're not looking!

Design / Direction: Todd J Neale


3D animation: Scott Stewart
Music & Sound design: Jasper Berg


Written by Derekh Froude & Todd J Neale

Sometime is hard to write the simplest of letters.
Sesame Street asked us to come up with a modular way to highlight individual letters, here is 1 of 3 letters we did in this series.



Directed by Todd J Neale


Music: Jasper Berg.


Written by Derekh Froude & Todd J Neale

How to build a really big letter "C" just follow these steps.



Design / Direction: Todd J Neale


3D animation: Scott Stewart


Music: Jasper Berg.

When Sesame Street ask us to create a film starring the number 18# we decided to try time lapse painting.

Inspired by the work of New York artist David Ellis.We shot with a digital still camera in our studio. Not quite to the scale or ambition of David's work, but hey it's for the kids.



Original music: Cem Adiyaman


Photographed by Todd J Neale

Local children's rock band AUDRA ROX wrote and performed an original song for a soon to be released Sesame Street DVD.

Shot entirely on green screen the band and kids performed having little idea of what environment they would end up being in.




Design & Direction: Todd J Neale

Editor: Adam Wissing / Shellac
